snippet: Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany sought to reassure Portuguese leaders on Monday that fiscal overhauls would be rewarded with long-term growth and stability.
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel seeks to reassure Portugal that fiscal overhauls will be rewarded with long-term growth and stability.

byline.original: By MELISSA EDDY and NIKI KITSANTONIS
byline.contributor: Melissa Eddy reported from Berlin and Niki Kitsantonis reported from Athens.

lead_paragraph: Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany sought to reassure Portuguese leaders on Monday that fiscal overhauls would be rewarded with long-term growth and stability.

headline.main: Merkel Vows Full Support for Portugal
headline.print_headline: Merkel Vows Full Support For Portugal
